name: AESDEC256KL
description: Perform 14 Rounds of AES Decryption Flow With Key Locker Using 256-Bit Key

instructionTypes.supportsCompatMode: Decrypt xmm using 256-bit AES key indicated by handle at m512 and store result in xmm.

longDescription: The AESDEC256KL1 instruction performs 14 rounds of AES to decrypt the first operand using the 256-bit key indicated by the handle from the second operand. It stores the result in the first operand if the operation succeeds (e.g., does not run into a handle violation failure).
flagsAffected: ZF is set to 0 if the operation succeeded and set to 1 if the operation failed due to a handle violation. The other arithmetic flags (OF, SF, AF, PF, CF) are cleared to 0.
